title: New Switch Pro Details? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 01.07.21
description:
Go to http://expressvpn.com/games to get 3 extra months for free!

Visit http://joinhoney.com/GAMES to get Honey for FREE today!

Go to http://amazon.com/GAMESRX to save on prescription medication and get FREE 2-day delivery!

Blessing and Imran discuss a new leak detailing more of what we can expect from the rumored Switch Pro console.

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:01:50 - Housekeeping
Thank you to our Patreon Producer: Black Jack
The Roper Report   -
00:03:40 - New details about the Switch Pro have leaked - Andy Robinson @ VGC
00:13:49 - Microsoft once tried to buy Nintendo - Megan Farokhmanesh @ The Verge
00:16:39 - What do you think a world of Microsoft Nintendo would have looked like? - Best Friends Q:The Nano Biologist
00:23:35 - Is Microsoft’s InXile working on an FPS RPG? - Jordan Oloman @ IGN
00:33:10 - Twitch removes the Popular PogChamp emote - Patricia Hernandez @ GiBiz
00:38:30 -  Ad  
00:42:30 - A Canceled 2006 Tomb Raider Game Is Now Playable - Zack Zwiezen @ Kotaku
00:45:00 - Hitman VR looks ridiculous
00:49:30 - Out today
 Reader mail   -
00:50:30 - What have been games that have disappointed you in the past? - JoshyG
00:56:50 - Squad Up:Ben(PS4/PS5) - BrucePSX / @PleaseBeXcited
00:58:12 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts:Greg and Janet Garcia

Subscribe! http://www.youtube.com/kindafunnygames?sub_confirmation=1

Support us and get the shows early here! http://www.patreon.com/kindafunnygames

Check out our store! http://www.kindafunny.com/store

Follow us on Twitter!
Blessing - http://www.twitter.com/BlessingJr
Tim - http://www.twitter.com/TimGettys
Greg - http://www.twitter.com/GameOverGreggy
Kinda Funny - http://www.twitter.com/KindaFunnyVids

Every day Greg Miller, Blessing Adeoye Jr., and Tim Gettys talk about the biggest stories in Video Games.

Background Wall Art by Orioto - https://www.facebook.com/OriotoPosters/
